settings.sleepCozmoPanel.confirmModal.de.translation: Tap Sleep to disconnect from your robot or leave Cozmo on his charger to boost his battery

settings.supportView.label.directions.translation: Disconnect from Cozmo and Navigate to:

settings.supportView.label.restoreCozmoC.translation: (Re-applies unlocks from this profile to your Cozmo)

settings.supportView.restoreCozmoModal.r.translation: WARNING: This option will restore Cozmo from a backup and replace the game progress on the robot. Use this option if you replaced your Cozmo with a new one.
